splash.my.name: My name is
splash.description: I have knowledge about the tools and technologies used in the development of web applications, focusing especially on the front-end area. My skills include designing interfaces and developing applications in React and Angular environments. Thanks to the acquired knowledge and skills, I am able to create attractive, interactive interfaces tailored to the unique needs of users.
achivements.studies.title: Studies
achivements.studies.description: Two completed fields of study where my passion for front-end development was born.
achivements.projects.title: Projects
achivements.projects.description: Numerous projects ranging from small websites to more comprehensive applications.
achivements.courses.title: Courses
achivements.courses.description: Several online courses that significantly deepened my knowledge in web development.
achivements.technologies.title: Technologies
achivements.technologies.description: Over twenty technologies and tools that I have learned, continuously improving my skills.
achivements.internship.title: Internship
achivements.internship.description: One year of internship and commercial experience that helped me grow into web development.
achivements.experience.title: Experience
achivements.experience.description: It has been three years since I published my first application, continuing to refine my expertise in the field.
about.title: About Me
about.description: I graduated from two different faculties, earning the title of Energy Engineer and Project Manager. My interest in programming and front-end technologies appeared in this period, when I created my first website during my studies at the Faculty of Computer Science. In addition, I participated in an intensive programming bootcamp, which further strengthened my programming skills. Over the next months, I explored this knowledge by implementing many online courses and creating my own concepts, which you can find in the projects tab. Thanks to this, I got to know a variety of front-end technologies and gained the skills needed to create modern user interfaces. In my private life, I put great emphasis on self-development and skilful time management. I believe that efficiently managed time and consistency is the key to continuous self-development.

studies.title: Studies
studies.description: During my studies in the IT department, I developed my first website, which sparked my passion for web development and programming.

courses.title: Courses
courses.description: Through intensive bootcamp courses, I created complex applications and deepened my understanding of modern web technologies.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Working on various projects allowed me to expand my knowledge and apply new technologies and programming languages in real-world scenarios.

internship.title: Internship
internship.description: I'm currently seeking an internship to take my first steps in Front-End Development, eager to contribute and grow professionally.

creativity.description: A creative approach to solving problems and designing unique solutions.

skillsList.name: Core Web Development
skillsList.description: Core Web Development skills are essential for creating modern and efficient web applications. Mastering these technologies enables building responsive, fast, and user-friendly websites.

skillsList.name: Libraries and Frameworks
skillsList.description: Libraries and frameworks offer powerful tools and reusable components that accelerate development. They help create scalable and maintainable web applications efficiently.

skillsList.name: Tools and Technologies
skillsList.description: Utilizing the right tools enhances productivity and collaboration during development. They assist in writing, testing, and deploying code efficiently while maintaining high quality.
